p: To the Keeper of the Common Jail of St Louis County Greeting:

Whereas complaint has been made be- fore me that one Henry Freeman a Negro is a Runaway Slave as set forth in the complaint of Alfred B Holton. There are therefore to command you to receive the body of the said Henry Freeman in to your common Jail and him safely keep until he be taken hence by his master and all reasonable char- ges paid, or until he be otherwise dis- charged according to Law.
Given under my hand this 20th day of July 1855
